definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Turn off the "ding" sound that alerts you to incoming mail.
sentences.chinese: 关闭提醒你有新邮件的提示音。

sentences.english: Reduces the minimum volume of the beep sound.
sentences.chinese: 在最低音量时候，减小操作提示音。

sentences.english: Just dial the access number given for the country you're calling from and wait for the prompt.
sentences.chinese: 只需拨打您所在国家的接入号码并等待提示音。

sentences.english: The same trick can also apply to the call ringtone and notification tone.
sentences.chinese: 同样的方法可以应用在电话铃声和提示音。

sentences.english: Amin is the mobile phone, SMS is just the tone.
sentences.chinese: 手机是阿明的，刚才那是短信提示音。

sentences.english: Right on cue, my cellphone buzzed with an alert.
sentences.chinese: 恰好在这个时候，我的手机响起一声通知提示音。

sentences.english: Provides code to play the computer's beep sound.
sentences.chinese: 提供用于播放计算机提示音的代码。

definition: to press down/to press a button
(onom.) sound of dripping water, a ticking clock etc
to sting or bite (of mosquito, bee etc)/to say repeatedly/to urge insistently/to ask repeatedly/to stick to a point/(onom.) tinkling or jingling sound
